#summary imageTag(source)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ViewHelperFunctions View Helper Functions]

*Description*

Returns an image tag and will (if the image is stored in the local `images` folder) set the `width`, `height` and `alt` attributes automatically for you.

*Return Type*:

String

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

||   || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| *source* || string || true || - || Image file name if local or full URL if remote ||

*Examples*:

{{{
#imageTag("logo.png")#
}}}
